text: Leonid Aleksandrovich Kvinihidze (; 21 December 1937 – 13 March 2018) was a Russian screenwriter and movie director.British Film Institute He was known for his movies Failure of Engineer Garin, The Straw Hat, Heavenly Swallows and Mary Poppins, Goodbye. Kvinihidze died in St. Petersburg on 13 March 2018 at the age of 81.Умер известный советский режиссёр Леонид Квинихидзе ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian screenwriters
title: Leonid Kvinikhidze
